grid.title: Resources
grid.sqlSelect: select R.[RESOURCE_ID], R.[ORGANIZATION_ID], R.[NAME] as [RESOURCENAME], R.[RES_CATEGORY_TYPE_ID], L1.LOOKUP_NAME AS [RES_CATEGORY_TYPE_NAME], R.[RESOURCE_TYPE_ID], RT.NAME as [RESOURCE_TYPE_NAME], R.[USER_ID], -- isnull(U.UserDetails, '(empty)') as UserDetails, U.UserDetails as UserDetails, R.[ATTACHED_FLAG], R.[ATTACHED_FLAG] as [ATTACHED_FLAG_DESC], R.[VENDOR_NAME], R.[EXT_VENDOR_ID], R.[ACTIVE_FLAG], R.[ACTIVE_FLAG] as [ACTIVE_FLAG_DESC], R.[FOREMAN_FLAG], R.[NOTES], R.[SORT_ORDER], R.[DATE_CREATED], R.[CREATED_BY], R.[DATE_MODIFIED], R.[MODIFIED_BY], R.[QP3_TEAM], R.[Role_Id], ROLES.NAME as ROLENAME, R.[Attribute1], R.[Attribute2], R.[Attribute3], R.[GroupName], R.[LocationLookupID], L2.LOOKUP_NAME AS [LocationLookupNAME], 0 as ROWORG_ID, R.IncludeInMonthlyCapacity, R.IsDriver, I.Item_Id as DefaultItemId, I.Name as DefaultItemName, R.DefaultItemIdForSA, ID.Name as DefaultItemNameForSA from dbo.Resources R left join dbo.Lookups_Active_V L1 on L1.LOOKUP_ID = R.RES_CATEGORY_TYPE_ID left join (select U.UserID, U.FirstName + ' ' + U.LastName as UserDetails from dbo.AspNetUsers U inner join dbo.AspNetUserOrganizations UO on U.UserID = UO.UserID where UO.OrganizationID = @ORGANIZATION_ID) U on R.USER_ID = U.USERID left join dbo.RESOURCE_TYPES RT on R.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = RT.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID left join dbo.Roles ROLES on R.ROLE_ID=ROLES.ROLE_ID left join dbo.Lookups_Active_V L2 on L2.LOOKUP_ID=R.LocationLookupID and L2.Attribute1 = convert(varchar(10), @ORGANIZATION_ID) left join dbo.Items I on I.Item_Id = (select top 1 RTI.Item_Id from dbo.Resource_Items RTI with(nolock) where RTI.Resource_Id = R.Resource_Id and RTI.DEFAULT_ITEM_FLAG = 'Y') and I.Organization_Id = @ORGANIZATION_ID left join dbo.Items ID with(nolock) on ID.Item_Id = R.DefaultItemIdForSA and ID.Organization_Id = @ORGANIZATION_ID where R.ORGANIZATION_ID=@ORGANIZATION_ID
grid.sqlUpdate:
update dbo.Resources set NAME=@ResourceName, RES_CATEGORY_TYPE_ID=@RES_CATEGORY_TYPE_ID, RESOURCE_TYPE_ID=@RESOURCE_TYPE_ID, USER_ID=case when @USER_ID=-1 then null else @USER_ID end, -- USER_ID=@USER_ID, ATTACHED_FLAG=@ATTACHED_FLAG, ACTIVE_FLAG=@ACTIVE_FLAG, NOTES=@NOTES, DATE_MODIFIED=getutcdate(), MODIFIED_BY=@CURRENT_USER_ID, Role_Id=@Role_Id, Attribute1=@Attribute1, Attribute2=@Attribute2, Attribute3=@Attribute3, LocationLookupID=@LocationLookupID, IncludeInMonthlyCapacity=@IncludeInMonthlyCapacity, IsDriver=@ISDRIVER, DefaultItemIdForSA=@DEFAULTITEMIDFORSA where RESOURCE_ID=@RESOURCE_ID
if @DEFAULTITEMID is not null begin update dbo.Resource_Items set DEFAULT_ITEM_FLAG = 'Y' where Resource_Id = @RESOURCE_ID and Item_Id = @DEFAULTITEMID
if @@ROWCOUNT > 0 update dbo.Resource_Items set DEFAULT_ITEM_FLAG = 'N' where Resource_Id = @RESOURCE_ID and Item_Id <> @DEFAULTITEMID and DEFAULT_ITEM_FLAG = 'Y' end
--* inserts missing resource_items entries in case resource type has been changed insert into RESOURCE_ITEMS (ITEM_ID, RESOURCE_ID, DEFAULT_ITEM_FLAG, DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY) select distinct RTI.ITEM_ID, Res.RESOURCE_ID, RTI.DEFAULT_ITEM_FLAG, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, @CURRENT_USER_ID from RESOURCES Res with(nolock) inner join RESOURCE_TYPE_ITEMS RTI with(nolock) on RTI.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = Res.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID inner join ITEMS I on I.ITEM_ID = RTI.ITEM_ID left join dbo.RESOURCE_ITEMS RI with(nolock) on RI.RESOURCE_ID = Res.RESOURCE_ID and RI.ITEM_ID = RTI.ITEM_ID where RI.ITEM_ID is null and Res.Resource_Id = @RESOURCE_ID and Res.ORGANIZATION_ID = I.ORGANIZATION_ID and I.ItemIsDT = 0 and isnull(I.ItemIsOT, 0) = 0
grid.sqlInsert:
declare @ResourceId bigint insert into dbo.Resources (NAME, ORGANIZATION_ID, RES_CATEGORY_TYPE_ID, RESOURCE_TYPE_ID, USER_ID, ATTACHED_FLAG, ACTIVE_FLAG, NOTES, [DATE_CREATED], [CREATED_BY], Role_Id, Attribute1, Attribute2, Attribute3, LocationLookupID, [FOREMAN_FLAG], IncludeInMonthlyCapacity, IsDriver, DefaultItemIdForSA) values (@ResourceName, @ORGANIZATION_ID, @RES_CATEGORY_TYPE_ID, @RESOURCE_TYPE_ID, CASE WHEN @USER_ID<>'-1' THEN @USER_ID ELSE NULL END, ISNULL(@ATTACHED_FLAG, 'Y'), ISNULL(@ACTIVE_FLAG, 'Y'), @NOTES, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, @CURRENT_USER_ID, @Role_Id, @Attribute1, @Attribute2, @Attribute3, @LocationLookupID, 'Y', ISNULL(@IncludeInMonthlyCapacity,1), isnull(@ISDRIVER,0), @DEFAULTITEMIDFORSA) set @ResourceId = scope_identity()
insert into RESOURCE_ITEMS (ITEM_ID, RESOURCE_ID, DEFAULT_ITEM_FLAG, DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY) select distinct RTI.ITEM_ID, Res.RESOURCE_ID, RTI.DEFAULT_ITEM_FLAG, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, @CURRENT_USER_ID from RESOURCES Res with(nolock) inner join RESOURCE_TYPE_ITEMS RTI with(nolock) on RTI.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID = Res.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID inner join ITEMS I on I.ITEM_ID = RTI.ITEM_ID left join dbo.RESOURCE_ITEMS RI with(nolock) on RI.RESOURCE_ID = Res.RESOURCE_ID and RI.ITEM_ID = RTI.ITEM_ID where RI.ITEM_ID is null and Res.Resource_Id = @ResourceId and Res.ORGANIZATION_ID = I.ORGANIZATION_ID and I.ItemIsDT = 0 and isnull(I.ItemIsOT, 0) = 0

column.label: Resource Category
column.dataSelect: select LOOKUP_ID as RES_CATEGORY_TYPE_ID, LOOKUP_NAME as RES_CATEGORY_TYPE_NAME from [dbo].[GetLooukpValuesByType] ('resource_category_type')

column.label: Resource Type
column.dataSelect: select RESOURCE_TYPE_ID, NAME as RESOURCE_TYPE_NAME from [dbo].[RESOURCE_TYPES] ORDER BY NAME OFFSET 0 ROWS

column.label: User
column.dataSelect: select User_ID, UserDetails from ( select -1 as User_ID, '(empty)' as UserDetails, 0 as Zorder union select top 100 percent U.UserID as User_ID, U.FirstName + ' ' + U.LastName as UserDetails, 1 as Zorder from dbo.AspNetUsers U inner join dbo.AspNetUserOrganizations UO on U.UserID = UO.UserID where UO.OrganizationID = @ORGANIZATION_ID ) X order by X.Zorder, X.UserDetails offset 0 rows

column.label: Role
column.dataSelect: select ROLE_ID, NAME as ROLENAME from [dbo].[ROLES] where Organization_ID=@ORGANIZATION_ID

column.label: Location
column.dataSelect: select lookup_id as LocationLookupID, lookup_name as LocationLookupNAME from dbo.Lookups_Active_V with(nolock) where type_code = 'location' and Attribute1 = isnull(convert(varchar(10), @ORGANIZATION_ID), Attribute1)

column.label: Attached
column.dataSelect: select 'Y' as ATTACHED_FLAG, 'Y' as ATTACHED_FLAG_DESC union select 'N' as ATTACHED_FLAG, 'N' as ATTACHED_FLAG_DESC

column.label: Active
column.dataSelect: select 'Y' as ACTIVE_FLAG, 'Y' as ACTIVE_FLAG_DESC union select 'N' as ACTIVE_FLAG, 'N' as ACTIVE_FLAG_DESC

column.label: Default BTE Item
column.dataSelect: select distinct I.Item_Id as DefaultItemId, i.name as DefaultItemName from dbo.RESOURCE_ITEMS RI with(nolock) inner join ITEMS I with(nolock) on RI.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID and I.ORGANIZATION_ID = @ORGANIZATION_ID where RI.RESOURCE_ID = @RESOURCE_ID

column.label: Default SA Item
column.dataSelect: select distinct top 100 percent I.Item_Id as DefaultItemIdForSA, i.name as DefaultItemNameForSA from dbo.ITEMS I with(nolock) where I.ORGANIZATION_ID = @ORGANIZATION_ID and i.ItemIsDT = 0 and isnull(i.ItemIsOT, 0) = 0 AND I.ITEM_TYPE_ID = 8 and I.ITEM_STATUS_TYPE_ID = 130 and I.BILLABLE_FLAG = 'Y' order by name
